scripts.preview: pnpm run build && CLOUDFLARE_ENV='' vite preview
scripts.compile: cd circuit && nargo compile && cp target/circuit.json ../worker/container_src/circuit.json
scripts.compile:noir: cd circuit && nargo compile && cp target/circuit.json ../worker/container_src/circuit.json
scripts.compile:all: pnpm run compile:noir && pnpm run compile:circom && pnpm run setup:circom
scripts.execute: cd circuit && nargo execute && cp target/circuit.gz ../worker/container_src/circuit.gz
scripts.nargo: pnpm run compile && pnpm run execute && cd circuit && nargo test
scripts.test: pnpm run test:noir && pnpm run test:circom
